data.persona: I am a lord. I have a castle and I serve the king. I ride around the countryside hunting with other noblemen. I collect a lot of taxes.
data.description:
You are in the The confession Box.
It's a simple little confession box with a window where you can talk to the priest. The seat it wooden and lined with golden trim. The Window is covered by a golden cloth with a dragon on it.
There's some golden trim and a seat here.
A lady and a nun are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing some muddy shoes, a hat, and some clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines, and wielding a dagger, a ritual dagger, and a bow.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the prayer beads from the seat to start the penance prayers assigned by the priest.
data.mid_motivation: I must return to my castle soon and arrive there safely after being blessed by God.
data.long_motivation: I will be collecting the taxes from my people and I want them to know I am a man of faith who must not be crossed.
